department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)/Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: A subscription agent is sought to provide services for acquisition, delivery, and support of subscriptions and access to an electronic resource management platform
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:  Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.  All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 07 September 2023 at 14:00 EST.
full_summary:
### RFSA Subscription Agent Services
###### *Link to notice in Ariba Discovery: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17067607?extsite=MTcwNjc2MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==*

The below tender announcement superseded all previous amendments with Amendment 4.

### Solicitation Number: WS3740006143
### Publication Date: August 8, 2023
### Tender Closing Date: September 7, 2023 at 14:00 EST (Note: This closing time is revised from the original posting)

### Description

Canada has a requirement for the services of a firm (“Subscription Agent”) to act on their behalf for the acquisition of subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media. This includes traditional print material added to the physical holdings of a library and electronic content hosted remotely by a publisher. The Subscription Agent will be responsible for delivering, managing, and related support for these subscriptions. Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform (ERMP) will also be required.

 Details about the scope of the work and the limitations of the authority of the Subscription Agent are outlined in Annex A, Statement of Work, and Annex C, Supply Arrangement Information and Contracting Instructions.

### Solicitation Brief

* **Subscribe to publications on behalf of Canada: including print and electronic materials**
* **Deliver, manage, and provide related support for subscriptions**
* **Access to Electronic Resource Management Platform (ERMP)**

### Important Considerations
* Only amendments to this tender serve as the official revision
* The Contracting Authority reserves the right to cancel this procendment
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

For questions about this solicitation, please contact Matthew Curran, the contracting authority.

 Phone Number: [No Phone Number Provided]
 Email: matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
